titleStmt.title: The papers which passed at Nevv-Castle betwixt His Sacred Majestie and Mr Al: Henderson: concerning the change of church-government. Anno Dom. 1646.
titleStmt.author: Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
Henderson, Alexander, 1583?-1646.
Marshall, William, fl. 1617-1650, engraver.
